RESOLVED_ENTITIES.the vehicles: RICARDO RODRIGUEZ, JR.'s vehicle and IGNACIO RODRIGUEZ, JR.'s vehicle

AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.undocumented aliens: individuals being transported in vehicles stopped by United States Border Patrol agents, often dropped off near Farm-to-Market Road 2050 to avoid checkpoints and walk to Highway 16 for further transportation to cities like Houston or San Antonio
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.RICARDO RODRIGUEZ, JR.'s vehicle and IGN: Vehicles involved in the incident, including a white Malibu sedan and a black Dodge pickup truck, stopped near the Border Patrol Station Parking Lot, suspected of transporting illegal aliens
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.RICARDO RODRIGUEZ, JR.'s vehicle: White Malibu sedan associated with RICARDO RODRIGUEZ, JR., used by smugglers and observed by Agent Jorge Luis Trevino near the Freer Immigration Checkpoint
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.IGNACIO RODRIGUEZ, JR.'s vehicle: Black Dodge pickup truck involved in a traffic stop and searched after IGNACIO RODRIGUEZ, JR. gave consent, also observed by Agent Jorge Luis Trevino near the Freer Immigration Checkpoint
